update td_experience_store
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
region_full_name = #{regionFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_images = #{storeImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_type_ids = #{storeTypeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lng = #{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
store_type_names = #{storeTypeNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update td_experience_store set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, region_full_name = #{regionFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_images = #{storeImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_type_ids = #{storeTypeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lng = #{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, store_type_names = #{storeTypeNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(id) from td_experience_store as s
left join td_user u on u.uid= s.uid
left join td_user c on c.uid= s.update_by
where 1=1
and s.status=#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and u.uname like CONCAT('%','${searchName}','%' )

select
, u.uname as username
, c.uname as updatename
from td_experience_store as s
left join td_user u on u.uid= s.uid
left join td_user c on c.uid= s.update_by
where 1=1
and s.status=#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and u.uname like CONCAT('%','${searchName}','%' )
order by sort asc
